description: Thumbnailer.js is an image minifier, capable of minifying images through the command line interface (CLI), programmatically, and on demand using libraries like Express. This Node.js package generates optimized, small-sized images, providing a solution for faster loading times and improved performance for your projects. Whether you need to process images in bulk, or on the fly through an API, thumbnailer.js has got you covered.
